name: Herd Hoard
description:
Please check the screenshots for TUTORIALS ==>

Enter a world filled with 3 adorable animals, each with 3 unique colors, and 3 possible sizes. Your task is to sort these cuddly creatures into their designated stockpiles by following a set of dynamic constraints. But beware - the difficulty increases as you progress!

Fullscreen recommended HOW TO PLAY:

Click to drag & drop the animals to their matching stockpiles based on the given constraints. Keep an eye on the stockpiles' capacities and fill them up to advance to the next round. Master the art of strategic sorting, and race against the clock to achieve the highest score possible!

Are you ready to become the ultimate Herd Hoarder?

Tips:

Aim to complete the stockpiles for bonus points! But be cautious and avoid making errors, as they will result in point deductions.

This game was made in about 6 hours for Trijam-213.

All Art, Sound and Code by Draelent - SlowDragon Games
